paper_metadata.title: Alleviating Poverty in China and in the Chinese Way: Strategies, Approaches, and Experience

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: China has made a substantial contribution to the achievement of the Millennium Development Goals (MDGs) by reducing half of its poverty population
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: This book series covers poverty reduction practices and experience, knowledge mobilization, poverty reduction strategy analysis, and comparative research of different poverty reduction models

bonus_information.qualitative_evidence_citation: The author found such a situation pervasive Anhui, Ningxia and other places during a survey in 2017

evidence_citations.program_name_citation: This book series covers poverty reduction practices and experience, knowledge mobilization, poverty reduction strategy analysis, and comparative research of different poverty reduction models
evidence_citations.country_citation: By analyzing China's poverty reduction approaches and experiences
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: the identification of poor households predominantly relied on village officials
